name: Fidget Spinner VR for Cardboard
description:
Fidget spin in this immersive smash arcade. Unlock cool spinners and new levels. Track your high score and have fun blowing things up with fidget spinners.

Unlock-able spinners include
- Standard spinner
- Alien spinner
- Bat spinner,
- Pizza Spinner

Levels include an arcade mode where you shoot phones and can unlock new stuff and three sandbox levels where you destroy things.
There include
- a tavern where you can break beer bottles
- a Stonehenge environment where you can destroy world monuments
- a space levels where you can shoot spinners at an astronaut and at the planet earth!!!


Have fun and looking forward to see you spin to the top!
